alert.note: Alert for San Francisco Bay Shoreline; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Santa Cruz Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 8:26PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A thunderstorm will impact portions of northern San Mateo County through 900 PM PDT... At 826 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm over El Granada, or near Millbrae, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail are possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Mateo, Redwood City, South San Francisco, San Bruno, Pacifica, Foster City, Burlingame, San Carlos, Belmont, Millbrae, Half Moon Bay, Hillsborough, Highlands-Baywood Park, El Granada, Highlands and Montara. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Francisco Bay Shoreline; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Santa Cruz Mountains
